ComicInfo.Summary:
Allen Keeg used to be a nobody. Now every woman Allen meets can't get enough of him. Where ever Allen goes he can get any woman he wants with ease. Every woman that is except the girl who broke his heart. He is slowly learning that being adored by every woman he meets isn't necessarily what it's cracked up to be. A lesson he is going to learn the hard way when Allen discovers just how extreme women are willing to go to be with him.
